DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate effect brimonidine tartrate ophthalmic solution 0.15 % ( Alphagan P ) pupil diameter different luminance condition .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Brimonidine Tartrate Ophthalmic Solution 0.15 % Pupil Diameter Normal Eyes
DOC.criteria: Adult active duty personnel 18 50 year age best correct visual acuity 20/20 better . Patients meet state age criterion Females pregnant lactate ( non pregnant female childbearing potential pregnancy test prior participate study ) History serious ocular , neurological , cardiovascular disease History severe systemic disease History arrhythmias high blood pressure Patients currently take type ocular systemic medication except multivitamin . Patients abnormal pupil shape , Addie 's pupil , anisocoria , abnormal pupil defect .
DOC.keyword: Large pupil render night vision difficulty halo , glare , monocular diplopia
